##############################################################################
# Top Level CMakeList.txt for HPXC
##############################################################################
  
# We require at least CMake V2.8
cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 2.8 FATAL_ERROR)

# ${hpxc_SOURCE_DIR} and ${hpxc_BINARY_DIR} are auto generated by cmake.
project(hpxc CXX C)

# project version
set(HPXC_MAJOR_VERSION 0)
set(HPXC_MINOR_VERSION 1)
set(HPXC_PATCH_LEVEL   0)
set(HPXC_VERSION "${HPXC_MAJOR_VERSION}.${HPXC_MINOR_VERSION}.${HPXC_PATCH_LEVEL}")
set(HPXC_SOVERSION ${HPXC_MAJOR_VERSION})

set(CMAKE_MODULE_PATH ${HPX_ROOT}/share/cmake-2.8/Modules)

find_package(HPX)

include_directories(${HPX_INCLUDE_DIR})
link_directories(${HPX_LIBRARY_DIR})

include_directories(${hpxc_SOURCE_DIR})

add_subdirectory(src)

add_hpx_pseudo_target(examples)
add_subdirectory(examples)
